alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 5:36AM AKST until December 29 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW RETURNS TO HAINES AND THE HIGHWAY... .Light to moderate snow is expected through Thursday night before changing to rain Friday as a surface low lifts north through the Panhandle. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow is expected Thursday afternoon. Highest amounts are expected near Haines Customs Station.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
